name: wan avocats
membership: Member of the International Association of Entertainment Lawyers (IAEL)
goal:
The firm is active both in counseling and litigation. In the IP sector, the firm enjoys recognized expertise in the apprehension of authors’ rights, neighbouring rights, and trademarks, in all sectors of cultural industries, and particularly within the digital field.


WAN advises authors, artists, interprets, producers, publishers, distributors, web sites, public or private entertainment companies and more generally, companies in the cultural industry and more specifically the music business industry.


WAN was also involved in several merger and acquisition operations in the audio and audiovisual industry and developed an expertise in legal audit and development of companies in the cultural industry.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives: EU politics and legislations on copyrights and competition law in the media / creation field, including the EU's  initiatives on the Digital Single Market
